objects.specification: A broad rectangular booth floor spanning approximately 6 meters in width and 4 meters in depth, presented as a thin horizontal plane with a neutral light gray finish that provides a subtle, unobtrusive background for the colorful furnishings and ensures clear visibility of all elements placed upon it.

A full back wall constructed as a tall flat panel measuring 6 meters across, 2.5 meters in height, and 0.1 meters thick, finished in a soft pastel tone to create a calm and welcoming backdrop at the rear of the booth.
A side wall panel 4 meters deep and 2.5 meters tall, presented as a slim vertical surface with a pastel finish to softly enclose the booth on one side while leaving the front open for access.
A corresponding side wall panel 4 meters deep and 2.5 meters tall with a delicate pastel coloration, balancing the enclosure on the opposite side and framing the space along with the back wall.

A welcoming registration desk at the front center of the booth, featuring a sleek rectangular form measuring approximately 1.5 meters wide, 0.7 meters deep, and 1 meter tall. It is finished in a vibrant coral red tone to draw visitor attention and provide a clear focal point for greetings and information.

A tall display shelf standing 2 meters in height, 1.5 meters wide, and 0.4 meters deep, located near the entrance on the left side wall. It has multiple flat surfaces for product showcases and is finished in a soft peach tone for a warm presentation.

A matching tall display shelf on the right side wall near the entrance, measuring 2 meters tall, 1.5 meters wide, and 0.4 meters deep, finished in a gentle coral-peach shade to coordinate with the left-side display for product demonstrations.

A medium-sized rectangular table measuring approximately 1.2 meters by 0.6 meters with a standard tabletop height of 0.75 meters. It is oriented with a slight inward rotation to face the booth’s center, finished in a soft cream tone to provide a neutral surface for interactive demos.
A second medium-sized demo table mirroring the dimensions of the first, rotated slightly inward toward the booth’s center and finished in a matching neutral cream shade to maintain visual cohesion.

A third demo table positioned to form part of a gentle semi-circle, rotated toward the central gathering area and maintaining the same size and soft cream finish for consistency across all interactive surfaces.
A fourth table completing the semi-circle arrangement, with the same dimensions and finish as the others, gently rotated inward to foster an inviting demonstration circle at the booth’s center.

A visitor chair with a comfortable seat height of 0.45 meters, a backrest reaching 0.9 meters in total height, and a footprint of approximately 0.5 by 0.5 meters. It is oriented to face directly toward its assigned table, featuring a soft mint-green cushion and slender metal legs for a lightweight, welcoming appearance.
An identical seating piece placed opposite the first around the demonstration table, rotated to face the tabletop directly and finished with the same mint-green upholstery and elegant metal supports.
A third chair positioned to the side of the table, oriented with its back facing outward and seat facing the table, in the same cohesive mint tone and slim-legged profile.
The fourth chair completing the quartet around the table, symmetrically placed and rotated inward to face the tabletop, matching its companions in design and color.
A fresh seating piece for the second demo table, identical in form and finish to the first set, oriented squarely toward the table surface.
A matching chair placed opposite its partner at the second table, maintaining a direct facing orientation and the same mint-green upholstery.
A side-positioned chair for the second table, turned to face inward toward the tabletop, echoing the design of its companions.
The final chair around the second demo table, symmetrically placed and facing inward, clad in the same pastel green cushion.
A chair for the third demo station, directly facing the table surface and featuring the same harmonious mint-green upholstery and slender leg profile.
An opposing chair at the third table, symmetrically aligned and turned toward the tabletop, consistent with the booth’s seating motif.
A side chair for the third demo table turned inward to face the surface, echoing the same elegant structural and color characteristics.
The final chair completing the seating quartet around the third table, oriented to face the demo surface and matching its peers in mint-green elegance.
An initial chair around the fourth demo table, facing inward toward the table surface with consistent seating design and color scheme.
A second chair situated opposite the first at the fourth table, oriented to face the tabletop and maintain seamless seating continuity.
A side chair at the fourth demo table, turned inward to provide a direct view of the demonstration area and matching its counterparts.
The final chair completing the circle around the fourth demo table, aligned to face the tabletop in the same mint-green and metal-leg style.

An elongated decorative banner suspended from the ceiling near the back wall, measuring approximately 0.5 meters in width and 2 meters in height. It features a bright golden-yellow finish to contrast beautifully against the pastel walls and add vertical visual interest.
A second elongated banner hung parallel to the first, featuring a punchy bright orange tone to enhance the festive atmosphere and reinforce branding presence.
A third ceiling-hung banner of the same dimensions, finished in a vivid cyan-blue hue to round out the trio of colorful displays and provide a dynamic focal point near the booth’s rear.
A slender cylindrical hanging light approximately 0.5 meters in length and 0.05 meters in diameter, with a warm yellow glow to cast a cozy, inviting illumination over the booth’s central area.
A matching warm-yellow pendant light mirroring the first, positioned symmetrically to ensure even ambient lighting across the booth floor.
A third pendant light suspended from the ceiling toward the back, replicating the warm yellow illumination style to highlight the demonstration area beneath.
A fourth cylindrical hanging light near the booth’s front center, finished in the same warm yellow hue to complete the even distribution of pleasant ambient lighting.
A festive helium balloon with a roughly spherical form of about 0.3 meters in diameter, finished in a vivid magenta tone and floating at mid-ceiling height to add a playful accent.
A slightly larger helium balloon at approximately 0.4 meters diameter, in a bright cyan-blue shade, floating at a varied height for visual layering within the cluster.
A smaller balloon of around 0.25 meters diameter in a bright yellow hue, adding contrast and depth to the mid-air decoration ensemble.
A medium-sized 0.35-meter balloon in a radiant orange tone, floating above the others to complete the celebratory cluster effect.

A small potted plant with a round pot approximately 0.5 meters in diameter and 0.7 meters in total height. It features lush green foliage emerging from a simple neutral pot, placed near the registration desk to introduce a natural accent and soften the booth’s entrance.
